title: Project 2025 Authors Fill Key Administration Positions
summary: A comprehensive analysis reveals that over 70% of Trump's cabinet has direct connections to Project 2025, with at least 31 individuals from the Heritage Foundation-backed initiative securing high-level government positions. Key appointments include Russell Vought (OMB Director), Tom Homan (Border Czar), Brendan Carr (FCC), and John Ratcliffe (CIA Director), demonstrating a systematic implementation of the conservative blueprint for executive branch transformation.

sources.title: The Project 2025 Contributors Helming the Trump Administration
